titleStmt.title: An almanack but for one day. Or, The Son of man reckoning with man upon an high account-day The last day. Latter day. Lords day. the Day of Judgment. Day of Doom. Licensed and entred according to order.

An almanack but for one day. Or, The Son of man reckoning with man upon an high account-day The last day. Latter day. Lords day. the Day of Judgment. Day of Doom. Licensed and entred according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: The words "Last day. .. Lords day" and "Day of Judgment. Day of Doom" are bracketed together on title page.
The British Library copy has MS date "15. May. 1686".
Identified as Wing A1246A on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700" reels 1803:5 and 1963:2; entry cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
